title: Lockette和res领地的OP权限
author: MC挖矿大神
txt_content:
Lockette锁箱子和res领地
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=375764&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E9%25A2%2586%25E5%259C%25B0%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=31301&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B61%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3DLockette%26searchoption%5B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
这两个插件如何让OP开启玩家箱子和破坏领地。 求教修改config{:10_524:}

replies.author: ttc_V
replies.txt_content:
enable-messages-user: true
enable-messages-owner: false
enable-messages-admin: true
enable-messages-error: true
enable-messages-help: true
explosion-protection-all: true
enable-chest-rotation: false
enable-permissions: false
enable-protection-doors: true
enable-protection-trapdoors: true
allow-admin-snoop: true
allow-admin-bypass: true
allow-admin-break: true
enable-quick-protect: true
enable-color-tags: true
default-door-timer: 0
custom-lockable-block-list:
- 116
- 84
- 57
- 145
- 154
- 138
- 52
linked-plugin-ignore-list:
- mcMMO
broadcast-snoop-target: '[Everyone]'
broadcast-break-target: '[Everyone]'
broadcast-reload-target: '[Operators]'
strings-file-name: strings-zn.yml
拿去我服务器对配置

replies.author: DreamsDeductive
replies.txt_content:
Lockette只能破坏掉玩家的牌子（但是个人不建议这样做）

RES的话

比如强行删除玩家领地

/resadmin delete 领地名

/resadmin 是管理员指令

replies.author: ttc_V
replies.txt_content:
DreamsDeductive 发表于 2015-6-22 00:33
Lockette只能破坏掉玩家的牌子（但是个人不建议这样做）

RES的话
谁告诉你只能破坏玩家箱子才可以开的

replies.author: ttc_V
replies.txt_content:
DreamsDeductive 发表于 2015-6-22 00:33
Lockette只能破坏掉玩家的牌子（但是个人不建议这样做）

RES的话
还有如果想res破坏玩家领地需用加residence.admin这权限,加完重启服务器生效

replies.author: ttc_V
replies.txt_content: residence.admin是OP权限 加完重启服务器生效
